pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:5.1: 42. The training rule on using high seats
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:6.2: At that time the nuns used high and luxurious seats.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:6.3: When people who were walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:6.4: “How can nuns use high and luxurious seats? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.2: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.3: “How can nuns use high and luxurious seats?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.7: How can nuns use high and luxurious seats?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:8.1: ‘If a nun uses a high or luxurious seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:10.2: one that is over-size is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:11.2: one decorated with images of wild animals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:12.2: if she sits down or lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:13.2: if she uses a high seat after cutting off the legs;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:13.3: if she uses a luxurious seat after removing the decorations with images of wild animals;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:13.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc42:14.1: The second training rule is finished.
